title: Be Honest With Me
description:
Description :
        What filters' do we use when we talk to people?'A timid college student who always hid her true feelings, disappears after collapsing on the street one day and then returns 1 year later. It's later revealed that she now has a rare disease called Rayleigh Syndrome', that causes her to say whatever's on her mind.A bumpy adolescence without a filter, and a coming of age story where words can both hurt and comfort.Be Honest With Me, Be Honest!,  !mangabuddy is a website dedicated to fans of anime, , , , video games, and cosplay.
